name: Clunky's Descent
description:
Dive into the depths of the Earth with Clunky, your friendly Learning Guide! What could go wrong?

Created for 'Appearing To Be A Completely Different Genre From What It Actually Is Jam' with Philly Game Mechanics.
Inspired by the creations of Humongous Games (Pajama Sam, Freddi Fish, Putt Putt), this game appears to be an edutainment game. But things are not always as they seem.
